This page presents a selection of my research outputs, spanning journal articles, conference papers, books, and theses. The works are grouped by category and year, with the most recent contributions listed first. My publications reflect ongoing interests in stochastic modelling, optimisation, control of complex systems, and quantitative risk management, with applications across energy, infrastructure, and finance.
